com.askonlinesolutions.wengage.CustomTex.android:text: Hi Carol. Welcome to Toronto! I see you are looking at Terroni too.
Hey Lea. I am! Have you been to Terroni before?
I have. Highly recommend their San Giorgio pizza. And great lattes.
Now I’m hungry . I’m in the city for a few days and hoping to have dinner there.
I'm headed to London next month.Would be great to exchange recommendations over dinner.
How is 7 pm for you? If that works I’ll send over the invite.
Perfect! Let’s meet right by the entrance of the restaurant. See you there!
